bug.short_desc: Error on Demobrowser startup if URL is pasted

long_desc.thetext:
Steps to reproduce: 1) Open IE6 3) Make sure the "Display script errors" option is activated 4) Paste the following URL into the address bar: http://demo.qooxdoo.org/current/demobrowser/ 5) Hit enter
Result: An "Access denied" script error popup is shown, followed by several "x is null or not an object" errors where x is one of the static members of qx.bom.client.Feature.
This error occurs regardless of which version of the Demobrowser is used. It does not occur if the Demobrowser is opened by clicking a link.

I seems to me that this is an issue with the IE. When you start the browser the first time with "about:blank" as start page. The first pasted page doesn't work, but when you start the browser with the default page, then the error doesn't occur.
